headline: Should Raymond James Financial’s Bigger Dividend And Buybacks Shift How RJF Investors View Its Growth Story?
summary: On December 3, 2025, Raymond James Financial’s board increased the quarterly common dividend to US$0.54 per share and declared a US$0.3984375 per depositary share dividend on its 6.375% Series B preferred stock, which is scheduled for full redemption at US$1,000.00 per preferred share and US$25.00 per depositary share on January 2, 2026. Together with a larger US$2.00 billion share repurchase authorization, these moves point to a stronger emphasis on returning excess capital while...
